ailments.name: ( Zingiber officinale
ailments.remedies: Rose., Ardraka/Sunthi)

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 5 gm. crushed rhizome with salt or jaggery tw ice daily before meal.

ailments.name: Ear Pain
ailments.remedies: 2-4 drops of fresh warm juice to be instilled in the ear (don't use when there is discharge)

ailments.name: Hoarseness of voice 1-3 gm. powder of dry rhizome
ailments.remedies: w ith honey in three divided doses.

ailments.name: Aches & pains
ailments.remedies: 10-20 ml. decoction prepared from 2 gm.of dry rhizome twice a day.

ailments.name: Cold/Cou&n
ailments.remedies: 2-5 gm. powder of dry rhizome with jaggery  thrice a day in divided doses. 10ml. decoction prepared from a piece of ginger every morning prevents recurrent attack of cold.

ailments.name: Headache
ailments.remedies: Warm paste should be applied over forehead upto 3A times a day.

ailments.name: Abdominal pain
ailments.remedies: 5 ml. juice in a glass of butter milk with lemon & salt.

ailments.name: Piles
ailments.remedies: 1 gm. powder and 1 gm. black- salt with butter-milk twice daily.

ailments.name: Painful Menses
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder of seeds with warm milk thrice a day for 2-3 days .

ailments.name: Urticaria
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder of seeds with

ailments.name: (Skin allergy) Abdominal pain
ailments.remedies: water twice daily. 1 gm. powder with luke warm water twice or thrice.

ailments.name: Flatulence (gas)
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. ajvain powder with equal quantity of Saunf powder with warm water.

ailments.name: Sinusitis
ailments.remedies: warm paste should be applied over forehead & little below the eyes in the morning.

ailments.name: Nasal block
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm powder should be put in steaming water & vapour should be inhaled; 2-3 time a day.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 1 gm. powder with warm water 1/2 hour before meals.

ailments.name: can be used in diet in any disease condition.
Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. juice of fruit, 1 gm. black- salt or fried Jira powder with honey or sugar to hold inside m outh for som etim e before food.

ailments.name: Bleeding piles
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. juice of fruit with sugar twice a day. or 10 gm. powder of dry fruit rind with equal quantity of sugar twice a day.

ailments.name: Diahhoria/ Dysentery
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. decoction of fruit skin thrice a day. Fruit may be eaten in plenty.

ailments.name: Hyper-acidity
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. juice of fruit twice a day. Even the fruit may be eaten.

ailments.name: Bad breath
ailments.remedies: Gargling with the warm decoction prepared from fruit skin 3-4 time a day.

ailments.name: Acne
ailments.remedies: Paste of seeds should be applied to affected part twice daily.

ailments.name: For general health
ailments.remedies: Regular use of Amla provides nutrition and boosts good health.

ailments.name: Hy >er Acidity/ Peptic Ulcer/ Constipation
ailments.remedies: 3-5 gm. powered fruit rind twice a day with milk. or 10-20 ml. fruit juice twice a day. or 3-5 gm. powered fruit rind twice a day with milk (Even raw Amla  can be eaten).

ailments.name: Stress
ailments.remedies: External ipplication of 25-50 gm. of fru'.i rind ground in butter milk on the forehead.

ailments.name: Diabetes
ailments.remedies: 10-20 ml. Fruit juice with 10-20 ml. juice of fresh rhizome of Haldi  twice a day.

ailments.name: Greying of Hair / Hair fall / Dandruff
ailments.remedies: Fruit rind soaked over night in water for application on scalp two hours before bath. or paste prepared from fruit rind should be applied two hours before bath. 1-2 fresh fruits eaten every morning prevents hair fall & early greying.

ailments.name: Bleeding gai ns
ailments.remedies: Fine powder should be gerthy massaged to gums after brushing at lease twice a day regularly.
Blume ,Tvak)

ailments.name: This commonly used spice is a good digestive & its pleasant flavour has soothing effect on mind.
Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder of bark with water twice a day.

ailments.name: Loss of Appetite
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder of equal parts of Dalchini and Ajvain for chewing in three divided doses before food.

ailments.name: Vomiting
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder with honey thrice a day in divided doses.

ailments.name: Tension headache
ailments.remedies: To be rubbed w ith w ater on a rough surface & applied to fore head.

ailments.name: Mental tension
ailments.remedies: The aroma has soothing action on mind. Crushed pieces may be kept in hanky or near the pillow.

ailments.name: Dry cough
ailments.remedies: Chewing controls the throat irritation and helps in dry cough.

ailments.name: Cold/ Cough
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction prepared from 5 gm.coarse powder with sugar and turmeric powder thrice a day. or use of dhania powder as herbal tea every morning prevents cold, cough & problem s related to digestion.

ailments.name: Intestinal worms
ailments.remedies: 3-5 gm. powder with jaggery twice a day for 5 days.

ailments.name: Sunstroke/ Dehydration
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction prepared from coarse powder with sugar and a pinch of salt frequently.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction prepared from 5 gm. coarse powder with a pinch of ginger powder thrice a day.

ailments.name: Fever
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction from  5 gm. powder with sugar 3-4 times a day.

ailments.name: Hiccough
ailments.remedies: 1-2 fru its to be chew ed frequently (not more than 4/ day).

ailments.name: Vomiting
ailments.remedies: 250-500 gm. powder of seeds fried in ghee thrice daily with honey.

ailments.name: Bad breath
ailments.remedies: 1-2 seeds to be chew ed frequently (not more than 4/ day).

ailments.name: Diarrhoea/Vomiting
ailments.remedies: Ash of the Elaichi skin 2 gm. with a little honey 4-5 times a day.

ailments.name: Cold
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction prepared from. 5 gm. Dhnnia, 1 gm Methi seeds, little turmeric powder should be taken 2-3 times/day.

ailments.name: Cough
ailments.remedies: Little elaichi powder with a tea spoon full of honey 3-4 times day. Even chew ing elaichi (Not more than 3 per day) frequently is help full in dry as well as p rodu ctive cough.

ailments.name: medicines in Ayurvedic system. Judicious use of ghee is very good for physical as well as psychological health.
Ulcer/ Wounds/ Bums
ailments.remedies: Application over affected part frequently.

ailments.name: Loss of Appetite
ailments.remedies: With Hing and Jeer a powder with food.

ailments.name: Memory
ailments.remedies: Use of ghee everyday in children improves memory.

ailments.name: Constipation
ailments.remedies: 5 ml. ghee put in a cup of warm milk should be taken with sugar at bed time.

ailments.name: Diabetes
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. fresh juice with 10 ml. juice of Amla twice daily.

ailments.name: Acne
ailments.remedies: A p plication of paste to the effected part twice a day. Use of Haldi with water, milk or cream on face gives glow to the skin & rem oves unw anted hair if used regularly.

ailments.name: Cold
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder with warm milk and sugar twice a day. Decoction of 1 gm. Haldi powder or use of H aldi in herbal tea prevents all allergic problems.

ailments.name: Wound/ulcer/ skin disease
ailments.remedies: To be washed with decoction of Haldi & paste of haldi should be applied. Paste made by mixing with Ghee /coconut oil should be applied over affected part.

ailments.name: Skin allergy
ailments.remedies: 1-3 gm. powder should be taken with jaggery twice a day.

ailments.name: disorders related to it. Best way is to fry hing in little ghee before use.
Abdominal Pain
ailments.remedies: Stir and dissolve in water and apply on & around umbilicus. Specially in children or infants where there is adbominal distention this is very helpful. 1 gm. Hing fried in ghee with butter milk twice a day.

ailments.name: Toothache
ailments.remedies: Keep fried Hing in carious tooth.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: A pinch of Hing fried in ghee & a piece of adrak crushed should be taken with butter m ilk before food.

ailments.name: Diarrhoea in children
ailments.remedies: A pinch of powder or fruit rubbed on a clean surface with milk or water should be given 3-4 times a day.

ailments.name: Irritability
ailments.remedies: If child is restless & irritable 1-2 pinch of powder given with milk acts as mild sedative. This may be used 3-4 times a day.

ailments.name: Black pigmentation
ailments.remedies: Black pigmentation over the face is common complaint in ladies especially around menopausal age. Jayphal  rubbed in milk and applied on such areas is helpful.

ailments.name: Abdominal pain
ailments.remedies: If pain is due to diarrhoea 2 gm. powder with warm water should be taken 4-5 time a day. It reduces the m otility of in testin e th eir by reducing pain.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 3-6 gm. powder of fried Jeera and rock-salt with warm water thrice daily.

ailments.name: Diarrhoea/Dysentery 1-2 gm. powder of fried
ailments.remedies: jeera with 250 ml. butter milk four times daily.

ailments.name: Hyper-acidity
ailments.remedies: 5-10 gm. ghee boiled with jeera should be taken with rice during meals.

ailments.name: Skin disease
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder of fried jeera with milk twice daily.

ailments.name: Cold
ailments.remedies: Warm decoction of 2 gm. jeera, 5 gm. Dhania, 1 gm. Haldi, 1 gm. Methi powder and little pepper should be taken with honey/ sugar with lemon two to three times.

ailments.name: Cough
ailments.remedies: Either decoction as mentioned above or chew ing few grains frequently helps in dry as well as productive cough.

ailments.name: Cough
ailments.remedies: 1 gm. powder of seeds with ghee and honey twice daily.

ailments.name: Skin diseases
ailments.remedies: Little powder with coconut oil for local application.

ailments.name: Hoarseness of voice
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder of seed fried with ghee twice daily, to keep in mouth.

ailments.name: Hiccough
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder of seeds with sugar twice daily.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: A pinch of powder with a piece of crushed ginger & rock salt should be taken before meal.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: A pinch of pow der with 2 tea spoon full of lemon juice with water V 2 hour before food.

ailments.name: Bleeding gums/
ailments.remedies: Pinch of pow der m ixed w ith

ailments.name: tartar/ bad breath
ailments.remedies: should be applied to gums after gargling with warm salt water twice a day.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice of fruit twice daily.

ailments.name: Diabetes
ailments.remedies: 1-3 gm. powder of seeds with water twice a day.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice with butter milk 1-2 times.

ailments.name: Skin diseases
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice in every morning in empty stomach.

ailments.name: Intestinal worms
ailments.remedies: 10 ml juice with jaggery in the morning for 3 days.

ailments.name: Acne
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice in empty stomach once a day.

ailments.name: Ear pain
ailments.remedies: 2-4 drops of warm fresh juice for instillation in ear twice a day (Don't use when there is discharge). or little paste boiled in coconut or mustard oil should be filled in ear 2-3 time a day.

ailments.name: Flatulence
ailments.remedies: 6 ml. juice with honey twice a day.

ailments.name: Gough/ Gold
ailments.remedies: Crushed bulb boiled in water is to be taken with sugar.

ailments.name: Joint pain
ailments.remedies: 5 gm paste of bulb with honey or with food twice a day. W arm  paste m ixed in any oil should be applied over the joint

ailments.name: ( Syzygium aromaticum
ailments.remedies: (L.) Merr & Perry, Lavanga)

ailments.name: Cough
ailments.remedies: To be chewed frequently or 1 gm. powder with honey 2-3 times in divided doses. 20 ml warm deoction prepared by puting 1 gm. clove 3-4 times daily. It is usefull both in dry and productive cough.

ailments.name: Cold / Hiccough
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. of powder with honey in three divided doses.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 1-2 gm. powder with warm water.

ailments.name: Tooth ache
ailments.remedies: Cr >hed clove should be kept in carious tooth.

ailments.name: Bad breath
ailments.remedies: Small piece should be chewed frequently.

ailments.name: Ear pain
ailments.remedies: Warm coconut oil prepared by boiling the pow der of Laung  should be filled in ear twice daily (Do not use w hen there is discharge).

ailments.name: It is commonly prescribed by Ayurvedic doctors as vehicle w ith m edicine especially in respiratory disorders.
Obesity
ailments.remedies: One teaspoon with glass of water in the morning.

ailments.name: Loss Appetite
ailments.remedies: With a pinch of pepper powder three to four times a day .

ailments.name: Cough
ailments.remedies: With a pinch of powder of Laung  three to four times.

ailments.name: Wounds/Ulcer/Bum
ailments.remedies: Honey and ghee should be mixed and applied.

ailments.name: Pyorrhoea/ (Bleeding gums)
ailments.remedies: Apply mixture of ginger, pepper, rock salt, honey & Ghee to the gums twice a day.

ailments.name: Face pack
ailments.remedies: Application of honey gives glow to the skin.

ailments.name: Note : Honey should not be boiled.
Diabetes
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder with milk twice daily.

ailments.name: Body ache
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder mixed with 2 gm. Jeera powder with warm milk and sugar twice daily.

ailments.name: Lactation (To increase mother's milk)
ailments.remedies: 5 gm. powder with milk and sugar in the morning.

ailments.name: Dandruff
ailments.remedies: Scalp should be massaged with paste mixed in the water V 2 hour before bath. Coconut oil boiled with methi powder should be used regularly. Use of methi paste acts as a good hair conditioner.

ailments.name: Hyper-acidity
ailments.remedies: Tender coconut water twice daily.

ailments.name: Kidney stone
ailments.remedies: Tender coconut water twice daily.

ailments.name: Wounds/Ulcer /Burn Dehydration
ailments.remedies: Oil should be applied frequently. Tender coconut water should be taken frequently.

ailments.name: Hair fall
ailments.remedies: Coconut oil processed with Methi  powder and Amla powder should be used regularly.

ailments.name: Sun stroke
ailments.remedies: Tender coconut water should be taken frequently.

ailments.name: Skin disease
ailments.remedies: 10 ml. juice of leaves with honey twice a day.

ailments.name: Wounds/Ulcer
ailments.remedies: Warm application of paste prepared from leaves over affected part.

ailments.name: Intestinal worms
ailments.remedies: 20 ml decoction made from hand full of leaves should be given in empty stomach for three days.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 20 ml. decoction made from hand full of leaves should be given in empty stomach for three days.

ailments.name: Dandruff/ Ring worm
ailments.remedies: Decoction made from hand full of leaves should be applied to scalp one hour before bath.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice with a pinch of salt and pepper before food.

ailments.name: Dehydration/ sun stroke
ailments.remedies: One Nimbu squeezed into a glass of water mixed with salt and sugar.

ailments.name: Bleeding gums
ailments.remedies: The fruit skin should be crushed & rubbed gently twice a day regularly to the gums.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 5 ml. juice with salt and a pinch of pepper before meals.

ailments.name: Hair fall
ailments.remedies: Coconut oil processed with the fruit skin dried & powdered.

ailments.name: Vomiting
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml juice mixed with water, su gar and a pinch of salt frequently in small quantities.

ailments.name: Sun stroke
ailments.remedies: Use plenty of onion for prevention of son stroke

ailments.name: Cold/ cough
ailments.remedies: In children the decoction made from a piece should be given with Jaggery thrice daily.

ailments.name: Dysentery
ailments.remedies: White onion chopped & fried in ghee should be eaten with rice.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 2gm. powder with guda twice daily before meal.

ailments.name: Cold/Cough
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder with honey thrice a day in divided doses. 10-20 ml. decoction with 2-3 gm powder of Pippali, ginger, black pepper with sugar or honey 2-3 times a day.

ailments.name: Pyorrhoea
ailments.remedies: Decoction of Pippali with honey & ghee to keep inside mouth for some time in the morning & before bed tinv

ailments.name: Diarrhoea
ailments.remedies: Mix 2-3 gm. pow der in 1 litre butter m ilk and divide equally into 4 parts. Take 1 part 6th hourly.

ailments.name: Cold with fever
ailments.remedies: 2 gm. powder with honey twice daily.

ailments.name: Indigestion
ailments.remedies: 3-5 gm. powder with powder of fried Jeera and rock-salt with warm water thrice daily.

ailments.name: Diarrhoea/Dysentery 3-5 gm. powder with butter
ailments.remedies: milk 3-4 times daily.

ailments.name: Abdominal pain
ailments.remedies: 3-5 gm. powder with butter milk 3-4 times daily.

ailments.name: Bad breath
ailments.remedies: Little quantity should be chewed after food.

ailments.name: Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 3-5 gm. pow der of roasted saunf with butter milk, little pepper powder & salt tw ice daily.

ailments.name: Cough/ Cold
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice twice or thrice a day with honey.

ailments.name: Fever
ailments.remedies: 30 ml. decoction from handful of leaves & 5 gm. Dhania thrice a day.

ailments.name: Skin allergy
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice twice or thrice daily.

ailments.name: Indigestion/ Loss of appetite
ailments.remedies: 5-10 ml. juice twice or thrice daily.

ailments.name: Greying of hair
ailments.remedies: Coconut oil processed with Tulsi  juice for regular use.

ailments.name: Wound/ulcer
ailments.remedies: Juice mixed with honey & Haldi  powder for application.

ailments.name: Ear pain
ailments.remedies: 2-3 luke warm drops 2 times daily (Do not use w hen there is discharge).
